LanguageData.Difficulty_BabiesAreHealthy_Info: Human babies are always born healthy. Parents can't die in childbirth or have miscarriages.
LanguageData.ChildBirthAlwaysHealthy_Desc: Gather to help a parent give birth. A doctor can help deliver the baby.
LanguageData.FertilizeGizmoDescription: Choose a person to fertilize this ovum to create an embryo. The embryo can then be implanted in a parent to start a pregnancy, or in a growth vat. The biological parents of the resulting child will be the person who provided the ovum and person who fertilized it.
LanguageData.ImplantDescription: Implant this embryo in a surrogate parent to begin a pregnancy.
LanguageData.ImplantDisabledNoWomen: No person can be a surrogate parent.
LanguageData.ImplantSurgeryConfirm: The implantation success chance for the {0} in {1} is {2}.\n\nThe implantation success chance is dependent on the fertility of the surrogate parent. It will be lower if the parent is too old or too young.
